goals.description: Process employee salaries accurately and on time, every pay period.
Ensure the payroll system remains compliant with all relevant tax laws and regulations, updated quarterly.
Generate and distribute payslips efficiently with minimal errors, within 2 business days of payroll processing.
Generate comprehensive payroll reports for management review by the 5th of each month.
Maintain data security and integrity by adhering to role-based access controls and data encryption standards consistently.
Oversee employee attendance and leave data integrated with payroll for accurate salary calculations monthly.
Provide employees with timely access to their payslips online immediately after payroll processing.
Facilitate employee updates to tax declarations efficiently, with confirmation within 1 business day.
Ensure data privacy and security for employee information by adhering to role-based access controls and data encryption standards continuously.
View payslips online easily and securely anytime after payroll processing.
Update tax declarations quickly and conveniently through a user-friendly interface within 5 minutes.
Receive accurate and timely salary payments directly to their bank account on the designated pay day.
Seamlessly integrate payroll with accounting software to automate financial reporting monthly.
